title: Frenzy
description: (B01B5CP19G: New Cover Edition) No good deed goes unpunished. Words Det. Kyle Poole is forced to live with when his life is turned inside-out by a vicious killer tearing his way through the city. The investigation goes from horrifying to bizarre when he discovers that the killer is a werewolf bent on destroying Kyle and all that he holds dear. To thrust the knife of revenge even deeper, he passes on this vile curse... to Kyle! Now, with two unstoppable machines of rage unleashed upon the innocent, how does Kyle save his city if he can't save himself?
author: Pike Stephenson
